    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      long readSigned()
      NGX has a special way of reading signed values of various sizes in bytes (up to long) by looking at the highest bit and keeping reading if this bit is 1
      long readUnsigned()
      NGX has a special way of reading unsigned values of various sizes in bytes (up to long) by looking at the highest bit and keeping reading if this bit is 1

        public long readSigned()
        NGX has a special way of reading signed values of various sizes in bytes (up to long) by looking at the highest bit and keeping reading if this bit is 1

        public long readUnsigned()
